metadata.name: HackTool - Mimikatz Kirbi File Creation
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of files created by mimikatz such as ".kirbi", "mimilsa.log", etc.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.kirbi')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('mimilsa.log'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of files created by mimikatz such as ".kirbi", "mimilsa.log", etc.
